commands.name: register
commands.help: Sign in the UE to Core

subcommands.name: --amf
subcommands.response: Registering UE ${nodeName} to AMF

subcommands.name: --smf
subcommands.response: Registering UE ${nodeName} to SMF

subcommands.name: --version
subcommands.response: Register command v1.0

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: register [--amf] [--smf] [--version] [--help]
--amf      : Register UE to AMF
--smf      : Register UE to SMF
--version  : Show version
--help     : Show this help message

subcommands.name: --force
subcommands.response: Force deregistering UE ${nodeName}

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: deregister [--force]
--force    : Force deregister UE

subcommands.name: --source
subcommands.response: Executing XN handover for UE ${nodeName} with source gNB ID ${arg1}

subcommands.name: --target
subcommands.response: Executing XN handover for UE ${nodeName} with target gNB ID ${arg1}

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: xn-handover --source <gnb-id> --target <gnb-id>
--source   : Source gNB ID
--target   : Target gNB ID

subcommands.name: --version
subcommands.response: XN Handover command v1.0

subcommands.name: --source
subcommands.response: Executing N2 handover for UE ${nodeName} with source gNB ID ${arg1}

subcommands.name: --target
subcommands.response: Executing N2 handover for UE ${nodeName} with target gNB ID ${arg1}

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: n2-handover --source <gnb-id> --target <gnb-id>
--source   : Source gNB ID
--target   : Target gNB ID

subcommands.name: --version
subcommands.response: N2 Handover command v1.0

commands.name: amf-info
commands.help: Show some status information about the given AMF

subcommands.name: --version
subcommands.response: AMF Info Tool v1.0.0

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: amf-info [--version] [amf-name]
--version : Show AMF Info version
--help    : Show this help message

subcommands.name: default
subcommands.response: AMF Info for gNodeB ${nodeName}: Connected and operational

commands.name: amf-list
commands.help: List all AMFs associated with the gNB

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: amf-list [--help]
--help   : Show this help message

subcommands.name: default
subcommands.response:
AMF List for gNodeB ${nodeName}:
AMF-01
AMF-02
AMF-03

commands.name: status
commands.help: Check the status of the gNodeB

subcommands.name: --simple
subcommands.response: Simple Status for gNodeB ${nodeName}: Operational

subcommands.name: --detailed
subcommands.response: Detailed Status for gNodeB ${nodeName}: Full operational details...

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: status [--simple] [--detailed] [--help]
--simple  : Show simple status
--detailed : Show detailed status

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: info
Show information about gNodeB

subcommands.name: default
subcommands.response: gNodeB Info for ${nodeName}: Model MSSIM-gnb-001, Location: Data Center A

commands.name: ue-list
commands.help: List all UEs associated with the gNodeB

subcommands.name: --version
subcommands.response: UE List Tool v1.0.0

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: ue-list [--version]
List all UEs associated with the gNodeB

subcommands.name: default
subcommands.response:
Connected UEs for gNodeB ${nodeName}:
imsi-306956963543741
imsi-306950959944062

commands.name: ue-count
commands.help: Print the total number of UEs connected to this gNodeB

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: ue-count
Print the total number of UEs connected to this gNodeB

subcommands.name: default
subcommands.response: Total number of UEs connected to gNodeB ${nodeName}: 2
